title: Cleveland's Got a Contender
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the Cavaliers impressive start to this season and why they are ahead of schedule. The Lakers need a game-saving three and Darvin Ham draws up a play for... Matt Ryan? Also, reaction to Kyrie's latest statement with the Nets. He says he's taking "responsibility", but does he still need to apologize? Finally, Luka is putting up Wilt-like numbers. Can he keep this pace up for the season? All that and more.
